subject: Re: Email query
preview: Hi Kathy,   Thanks for the update, and yes, that should be fine.    I'll forward this to @Wolf IQ Support so they can assist further with anything that comes up along the way.    Thanks,  Andy     On

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Kathy,

Thanks for the update, and yes, that should be fine.

I'll forward this to @Wolf IQ Support so they can assist further with anything that comes up along the way.

Thanks,
Andy

On Thu, Jun 26, 2025 at 12:16 PM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,

Thanks for your clarification.

I have gone back to the third party - they would like to take control of the domain in order to proceed with creating email accounts.

Are you ok with this, since there may be outstanding issues with the website (search optimisation etc) to be done? They would like me to change the password which I can share with you and your team again - would this work?

Thanks,

Kathy


From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, June 17, 2025 11:15 AM
To: Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>; Victoria Victoria <victoria@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Email query
Hi Kathy,

Apologies for the confusion and the delay here.

To clarify - yes, it's a delay issue rather than a lack of support capability. Resolving it properly on our end could potentially take a few more weeks..

Let me know how you'd like to proceed. We're still happy to support however we can.

Thanks,
Andy

On Tue, Jun 17, 2025 at 8:12 AM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:
Thanks Andy.

I had previously engaged an external IT for this purpose, but decided to go with you guys to keep things simple.

Can I please confirm that WolfIQ is unable to assist at all, or was it just a delay issue?

Thanks,
Kathy


From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, June 17, 2025 9:04 AM
To: Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>; Victoria Victoria <victoria@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Email query
VV - drafted this

***
Hi Kathy,

Thanks again for your patience.

As the inboxes are a crucial part of your business operations, we wanted to flag that while we've been working to resolve the issues on our end, it may take additional time to fully implement.

To avoid further delays, we'd be happy to refer you to one of our past IT professionals who specialises in inbox setups and may be able to assist more efficiently.

Of course, we're still here to support where we can. Please let us know if you'd be open to the referral, and we can put you in touch directly.

Thanks,
Andy

On Fri, Jun 13, 2025 at 8:29 AM Victoria Victoria <victoria@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hi Kathy,

Just a quick update on the MGA email/inbox setup.

At the moment, we're experiencing a delay on our side with adding new customers to the system, and I sincerely apologise for the hold-up.

We completely understand how important this is for your team, and I want to assure you that it's being actively followed up.

I'll keep you updated and will let you know as soon as we're able to proceed.

Thank you again for your patience and understanding.

Best,
Victoria

On Fri, Jun 13, 2025 at 7:46 AM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,

Thank you for the update.

We have put a couple of things related to the business running on hold awaiting for MGA's email account to be set up, so it would be great if things can get moving as soon as you are able.

Additionally, I have a few questions about the website, and would be grateful if I can make the following requests:

1. Visibility remains non-existent when I search for the following key words, and would be great if you can optimise the search:
  • 'preventive genomics' - this is the most important one
  • Preventive genome
  • Wellness genomics
  • Healthy genome
  • pharmacogenomics

2. Are you able to build an additional subpage named 'partners' or 'partnerships' like the one here https://www.veritasint.com/partners/

3. For the 'Stay Connected' function, are you able to set up an auto-reply from the MGA email address with acknowledgement and some pre-drafted information (which I can provide) about the company, when someone submits to it?

Many thanks,

Kathy

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, June 11, 2025 10:12 AM
To: Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>; Victoria Victoria <victoria@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Email query
Hi Kathy,

Thanks again for your patience.

Just a quick note to let you know we're experiencing a delay on our side in adding new customers at the moment, which is what's holding this up.

Totally on us, apologies for the inconvenience.

Looping in @Victoria here, who will be looking after this and will provide an update as soon as we're able to move forward.

Thanks,
Andy


On Sun, Jun 8, 2025 at 9:50 AM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,

No problem.

Could I please add a couple more aliases:

  • PA@mygenomeaustralia.com.au
  • ClientSupport@mygenomeaustralia.com.au

Many thanks and look forward to having the inboxes set up.

Cheers,
Kathy

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Saturday, June 7, 2025 8:11 AM
To: Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Email query
Hi Kathy,

Apologies our team didn't get this to you before the long weekend.

We will get it to you first thing Monday.

Thanks,
Andy



On Fri, Jun 6, 2025 at 11:03 AM Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Thanks Kathy.

It will be with gmail. We'll set this up today and send it through.

Thank you,
Andy

On Fri, Jun 6, 2025 at 10:56 AM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:
Many thanks Andy for the reply on security questions.

Who is your provider by the way?

Yes please proceed to set up the 2 inboxes.

Thanks,

Kathy
From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Friday, June 6, 2025 10:48 AM
To: Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Email query
Hi Kathy,

Great questions - here's a quick summary on email security:
  1. Breach Notifications: If there's suspicious activity or a suspected breach, we're notified immediately by our email provider. We'll alert you straight away if that occurs.
  2. Breach Details: While we can confirm if there was unauthorised access, identifying the specific source (e.g. who accessed it) depends on what forensic logs are available.
  3. Ongoing Monitoring: Yes, the email infrastructure is continuously monitored by our provider for anomalies and security threats.
  4. Secure Attachments: Yes - attachments can be sent securely via password-protected links if needed. We can show you how to enable this.
Please let us know if you'd like us to set-up those two inboxes.

Thanks,
Andy

On Thu, Jun 5, 2025 at 3:05 PM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,

Thanks for the clarifications

Some final more important questions regarding data security:
  • How do we know if the data security of our email account has been breached?
  • If a data breach has happened, how soon would we know? Would we be able to know who hacked the emails?
  • Does your team monitor data security relating to emails?
  • Will there be 'secure attach' function to the emails?

Many thanks,

Kathy


From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, June 5, 2025 4:55 PM
To: Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Email query
Hi Kathy,

Thanks for the clarification - and yes, you're right:
  1. Two inboxes means two separate accounts (separate logins, storage, etc.).
  2. And yes, I meant admin@mygenomeaustralia.com.au - thanks for spotting that.
We checked availability:
  1. myga.com.au is already taken
  2. However, my-ga.com.au is available if that's something that could work for you.
Let us know if you'd prefer we proceed with mygenomeaustralia.com.au, or if you'd like us to secure my-ga.com.au and set up accounts on that instead.

Thanks,
Andy


On Thu, Jun 5, 2025 at 10:49 AM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:
Presumably both inboxes would count as one email account?

Did you mean Admin@mygenomeaustralia.com.au (not @mga.com.au)

Although not ideal, would @myga.com.au happen be available, as a trade-off for the long letters? What are your thoughts as obviously 'myga' is different to the logo of mga??

Thanks,
Kathy
From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, June 5, 2025 10:42 AM
To: Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Email query
Hi Kathy,

Yes - confirming we can set-up two inboxes.
  1. kathy.wu@mygenomeaustralia.com.au
  2. Admin@mga.com.au (for all inbound email that is not sent to 1)
Let me know if that's accurate and we'll get set-up.

Thanks,
Andy

On Thu, Jun 5, 2025 at 10:41 AM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:
Thanks Andy!

Could I please have mine (kathy.wu@mygenomeaustralia.com.au) as a separate inbox, and all the other aliases as one inbox?

Many thanks,
Kathy
From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, June 5, 2025 10:10 AM
To: Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Email query
Hi Kathy,

Thanks for confirming. It's a yes to both questions.

On aliases, a wildcard alias, or catch-all, allows any email sent to your domain that's not a specific user or alias to be delivered to a designated mailbox.

Would you like us to just set that up with the one inbox?

Thanks,
Andy

On Thu, Jun 5, 2025 at 7:12 AM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,

That all sounds good, but could I please also confirm:
  • email backups are included as part of the website backup?
  • Future aliases can be created at no additional cost?

Thanks,

Kathy
From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, June 4, 2025 7:18 PM
To: Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Email query
Hi Kathy,

We checked, and unfortunately, mga.com.au is already taken.

We recommend proceeding with @mygenomeaustralia.com.au.

One email account is $150 for the year. There is no additional cost for aliases. Let us know if you'd like us to set-up this email account and add all the below as aliases.

Let us know if that works, and we'll get it set up.

Thanks,
Andy

On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 9:33 AM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:

Thanks Andy for your prompt reply.

At this stage, I am thinking (can it be @mga?):

  • kathy.wu@mga.com.au
  • Admin@mga.com.au
  • Reception@mga.com.au
  • geneticist@mga.com.au
  • GeneticCounsellor@mga.com.au

Would there be additional fee involved?

Thanks,

Kathy

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 4 June 2025 9:24 AM
To: Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au>
Cc: Cindy Valderama <cindy@wolfiq.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Email query


Hi Kathy,


Yes - we can do this for you.


Apologies I believe you asked us already on this but I can't find the email.


We just require the core email and any aliases we can set-up for you. Let me know if these work:

  • Core email: kathy.wu@mygenomeaustralia.com.au
  • Aliases: kathy@mygenomeaustralia.com.au, kwu@mygenomeaustralia.com.au

@Daphne Bautista can get this set-up for you today and confirm if we need anything.


Thanks again,

Andy


On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 9:18 AM Kathy Wu <kathy.wu@svha.org.au> wrote:

Hi Cindy / Andy,

A quick question - can your team assist with setting up an email account for MyGenome Australia?

Thanks,

Kathy
